mapper.select: SELECT hno, hname, haddr, SUBSTRING_INDEX(himg, ',', 1) AS himg, TIME_FORMAT(hopentime, '%H:%i') AS hopentime, TIME_FORMAT(hclosetime, '%H:%i') AS hclosetime, CASE WHEN hnightday = '월요일' THEN 1 WHEN hnightday = '화요일' THEN 2 WHEN hnightday = '수요일' THEN 3 WHEN hnightday = '목요일' THEN 4 WHEN hnightday = '금요일' THEN 5 WHEN hnightday = '토요일' THEN 6 WHEN hnightday = '일요일' THEN 0 END AS hnightday, TIME_FORMAT(hnightendtime, '%H:%i') AS hnightendtime, TIME_FORMAT(hbreaktime, '%H:%i') AS hbreaktime, TIME_FORMAT(hbreakendtime, '%H:%i') AS hbreakendtime, hholiday, TIME_FORMAT(hholidayendtime, '%H:%i') AS hholidayendtime FROM hospital
SELECT pno, pname, paddr, TIME_FORMAT(popentime, '%H:%i') AS popentime, TIME_FORMAT(pclosetime, '%H:%i') AS pclosetime FROM pharmacy
